import ast
import re

with open(''test_approval_tracker.py'', ''r'') as f:
    content = f.read()
    
# Count test methods
test_methods = re.findall(r''def (test_\w+)'', content)
print(f''Total test methods: {len(test_methods)}'')
print(f''\nTest methods:'')
for i, method in enumerate(test_methods, 1):
    print(f''{i:2}. {method}'')
")
